title: Peter Pan (Disney)
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney, Hamilton Luske, Clyde Geronimi and Wilfred Jackson
brief_description: Disney’s well-loved version of the Sir James M. Barrie play. The Darling children are taken on a series of wonderful adventures to Never-never Land. Their guide is the daring and magical Peter Pan who refuses to ever grow up. Along with Peter and his gang of Lost Boys, assisted by the beautiful fairy Tinkerbell, the Darling children do battle against the wicked Captain Hook to save Never-never Land from his evil plans. Beautifully animated and featuring the voices of Bobby Driscoll and Kathryn Beaumont.
